results.title: Cruel Intentions
results.brief_description: Slaking a thirst for dangerous games, Kathryn challenges her stepbrother, Sebastian, to deflower their headmaster’s daughter before the summer ends. If he succeeds, the prize is the chance to bed Kathryn. But if he loses, Kathryn will claim his most prized possession.

constellations_other.name: Power and privilege, monarchy and make-up
constellations_other.description: The upper echelons of society explored through colour, make-up and scandal.

results.description: Slaking a thirst for dangerous games, Kathryn challenges her stepbrother, Sebastian, to deflower their headmaster’s daughter before the summer ends. If he succeeds, the prize is the chance to bed Kathryn. But if he loses, Kathryn will claim his most prized possession.

video_links.name: CRUEL INTENTIONS - Official Trailer - Back in Theaters for the 20th Anniversary

results.title: Crossroads
results.brief_description: Three friends get together and bury a box making a pact to open it at midnight at their high school graduation. In the little town in Georgia that they live in, things soon change. One is little miss perfect, one is an engaged prom queen, and the other is a pregnant outcast. The night of graduation, they open the box and they strike up a conversation. All of a sudden, one brings up the topic of her going to Los Angeles for a record contract audition. They all decide to go together and they leave. With a little money, they set out on the road with a guy named Ben. When one of them tells the other a rumor that he might be a homicidal maniac they are all scared of him. When they reach LA, Lucy falls in love with Ben and against her father’s wishes, she stays and she goes to the audition.

results.title: Coraline
results.creator_credit: Focus Features, Laika Entertainment, Henry Selick, Harry Linden, Neil Gaiman, Kent Burton, Mary Sandell, Eric Wachtman, Bill Mechanic, Claire Jennings, Pandemonium and Margaret Meyer
results.brief_description: An adventurous girl walks through a secret door in her new home and discovers a strangely idealised version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

constellations_other.name: Storytime animated
constellations_other.description: Abra Cadabra was the world's first stereoscopic 3D film, but animators and filmmakers had experimented with the technology far earlier and continue to use other older techniques like stop-motion animation.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Focus Features, Laika Entertainment, Henry Selick, Harry Linden, Neil Gaiman, Kent Burton, Mary Sandell, Eric Wachtman, Bill Mechanic, Claire Jennings, Pandemonium and Margaret Meyer
results.description: When Coraline moves to an old house, she feels bored and neglected by her parents. She finds a hidden door with a bricked up passage. During the night, she crosses the passage and finds a parallel world where everybody has buttons instead of eyes, with caring parents and all her dreams coming true. When the Other Mother invites Coraline to stay in her world forever, the girl refuses and finds that the alternate reality where she is trapped is only a trick to lure her.
description_for_label: When Coraline moves to an old house, she feels bored and neglected by her parents. She finds a hidden door with a bricked up passage. During the night, she crosses the passage and finds a parallel world where everybody has buttons instead of eyes, with caring parents and all her dreams coming true. When the Other Mother invites Coraline to stay in her world forever, the girl refuses and finds that the alternate reality where she is trapped is only a trick to lure her.

results.title: Coherence
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2013
results.brief_description: On the night of an astronomical anomaly, eight friends at a dinner party experience a troubling chain of reality bending events.
results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2013
results.description: On the night of an astronomical anomaly, eight friends at a dinner party experience a troubling chain of reality bending events.
description_for_label: On the night of an astronomical anomaly, eight friends at a dinner party experience a troubling chain of reality bending events.

results.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
results.brief_description: After an encounter with UFOs, a line worker feels undeniably drawn to an isolated area in the wilderness where something spectacular is about to happen.

constellations_other.name: The Kubrick connection
constellations_other.description: The visual effects for Blade Runner drew on a number of techniques from other iconic films, including two of Stanley Kubrick's masterpieces.

results.description: After an encounter with UFOs, a line worker feels undeniably drawn to an isolated area in the wilderness where something spectacular is about to happen.

creators_other.name: Julia Phillips and Michael Phillips Productions

video_links.name: CLOSE ENCOUNTERS OF THE THIRD KIND - Official Trailer

results.title: Close-Up
results.brief_description: This fiction-documentary hybrid uses a sensational real-life event—the arrest of a young man on charges that he fraudulently impersonated the well-known filmmaker Mohsen Makhmalbaf—as the basis for a stunning, multilayered investigation into movies, identity, artistic creation, and existence, in which the real people from the case play themselves.
results.description: This fiction-documentary hybrid uses a sensational real-life event—the arrest of a young man on charges that he fraudulently impersonated the well-known filmmaker Mohsen Makhmalbaf—as the basis for a stunning, multilayered investigation into movies, identity, artistic creation, and existence, in which the real people from the case play themselves.

results.title: Cléo from 5 to 7
results.creator_credit: Ciné-Tamaris, Rome Paris Films, Agnès Varda, Bernard Evein, Carlo Ponti, Georges de Beauregard and Alyette Samazeuilh
results.brief_description: Agnès Varda eloquently captures Paris in the sixties with this real-time portrait of a singer set adrift in the city as she awaits test results of a biopsy. A chronicle of the minutes of one woman’s life, Cléo from 5 to 7 is a spirited mix of vivid vérité and melodrama, featuring a score by Michel Legrand and cameos by Jean-Luc Godard and Anna Karina.

constellations_other.name: All about Agnes
constellations_other.description: Belgian director Agnes Varda was the only female director in the French New Wave movement and is known for her long career across influential documentary and dramas, and for her trademark humour, curiosity and insight.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Ciné-Tamaris, Rome Paris Films, Agnès Varda, Bernard Evein, Carlo Ponti, Georges de Beauregard and Alyette Samazeuilh
results.description: Agnès Varda eloquently captures Paris in the sixties with this real-time portrait of a singer set adrift in the city as she awaits test results of a biopsy. A chronicle of the minutes of one woman’s life, Cléo from 5 to 7 is a spirited mix of vivid vérité and melodrama, featuring a score by Michel Legrand and cameos by Jean-Luc Godard and Anna Karina.

results.title: Citizenfour
results.creator_credit: JustFilms / Ford Foundation, The Bertha Foundation, RADiUS-TWC and Kirsten Johnson
results.headline_credit: Germany, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2014
results.brief_description: Laura Poitras blurs the line between documentary and investigative journalism. Poitras was one of three journalists confided in by whistleblower Edward Snowden when he shared classified documents that detailed global government surveillance. Telling his story earned Poitras a Pulitzer, while Citizenfour won an Oscar.

constellations_primary.name: Freedom from surveillance
constellations_primary.description: Real world and cinematic authoritarianism and resistance explored through documentaries, Hollywood blockbusters, TV and videogames.

constellations_other.name: Orwell & Snowden
constellations_other.description: Explores Orwell as a representation of the NSA, and the infamous Snowden leak.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

results.creator_credit_for_label: JustFilms / Ford Foundation, The Bertha Foundation, RADiUS-TWC and Kirsten Johnson
results.headline_credit_for_label: Germany, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2014
results.description: In June 2013, Laura Poitras and reporter Glenn Greenwald flew to Hong Kong for the first of many meetings with Edward Snowden. She brought her camera with her.
description_for_label: In June 2013, Laura Poitras and reporter Glenn Greenwald flew to Hong Kong for the first of many meetings with Edward Snowden. She brought her camera with her.

results.title: Cinema Paradiso
results.creator_credit: Les Films Ariane, Cristaldifilm, RAI and Giuseppe Tornatore
results.brief_description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood, when he fell in love with the movies at his village’s theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater’s projectionist.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Les Films Ariane, Cristaldifilm, RAI and Giuseppe Tornatore
results.description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood, when he fell in love with the movies at his village’s theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater’s projectionist.

results.title: Cinderella
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Productions, Walt Disney, Ted Sears, Hamilton Luske, Wilfred Jackson, Bill Peet, Ken Anderson, Winston Hibler, Clyde Geronimi, Erdman Penner, Joe Rinaldi, Homer Brightman and Harry Reeves
results.brief_description: Disney’s beloved animated classic tells the rags-to-riches story of a young woman with an awful step-family.

constellations_other.name: Princesses, rom-coms and sit-coms
constellations_other.description: Newsreel footage was captured on large, bulky 35mm cameras like the Mitchell Newsreel Camera by operators in the field, but they were also used by film production companies and on TV shows, with some of those involved going on to define different genres.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Productions, Walt Disney, Ted Sears, Hamilton Luske, Wilfred Jackson, Bill Peet, Ken Anderson, Winston Hibler, Clyde Geronimi, Erdman Penner, Joe Rinaldi, Homer Brightman and Harry Reeves
results.description: Cinderella has faith her dreams of a better life will come true. With help from her loyal mice friends and a wave of her Fairy Godmother’s wand, Cinderella’s rags are magically turned into a glorious gown and off she goes to the Royal Ball. But when the clock strikes midnight, the spell is broken, leaving a single glass slipper… the only key to the ultimate fairy-tale ending!
